channel.title: [req]Respawning after dying[req]
channel.description: So, when someone dies he loses his items, but spawns where he died. Sometimes teles home when died. Anyone...? If I didn't explain clearly enough feel free to notice lol.

item.title: [req]Respawning after dying[req]
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

In client.class search this

//pEmote = 15;
If you can’t find pEmote then search this.

Oh dear, You have died

Until you will see something like this.

teleportToX = 2439; teleportToY = 5169; heightLevel = 0; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear, You have died"); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
Then change the teleportTox and TeleportToy to your coords

Read full topic

item.title: [req]Respawning after dying[req]
item.dc:creator: @Rage-Pk -Rage-Pk
item.description:
@Rage-Pk wrote:

I’m not 100% sure but when you die the method is in your client class, search youdied or applydead one of them, their will be multiple applydeads so make sure to change them all.

I think that was your question, I couldnt understand fully ;p

Read full topic

item.title: [req]Respawning after dying[req]
item.dc:creator: @Conspiracy Conspiracy
item.description:
@Conspiracy wrote:

[quote=“Kayceee, post:4, topic:330156”]Look for the coords of where you died in PlayerHandler.java
You can find your position ingame by typing ::coords or ::mypos
Near it will most likely be something along the lines of: teleportToY(SOME RANDOM NUMBERS HERE) And the same for the X coordinate and then if it might say something like misc.random(2) or something along those lines (This means that sometimes you will spawn at home or sometimes where you died.

Or it could just be a Glitch because of LAG that you ‘Respawn’ In the same place OR your server has something so that When you are using Protect Item you don’t actually die, you just do the Dieying GFX And then you can run away without being attacked.

Sorry if that wasnt clear but I hoped it helps :|[/quote] Hmm thanks, gonna try that soon. Also how do I make them fall like on rs instead of teleing when they die?

Read full topic

item.title: [req]Respawning after dying[req]
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Look for the coords of where you died in PlayerHandler.java
You can find your position ingame by typing ::coords or ::mypos
Near it will most likely be something along the lines of: teleportToY(SOME RANDOM NUMBERS HERE) And the same for the X coordinate and then if it might say something like misc.random(2) or something along those lines (This means that sometimes you will spawn at home or sometimes where you died.

Or it could just be a Glitch because of LAG that you ‘Respawn’ In the same place OR your server has something so that When you are using Protect Item you don’t actually die, you just do the Dieying GFX And then you can run away without being attacked.

Sorry if that wasnt clear but I hoped it helps

Read full topic
